statements: DELETE FROM debtors WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM debtors WHERE total_debt > 5000 AND last_interaction < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM debtor_communication_logs WHERE debtor_id = 100 AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM debtor_interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM debtor_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE debtor_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM debt_resolution WHERE debtor_id = 100 AND resolution_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM payment_logs WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
